meanings.sent1: The factory produced caoutchoucs for making tires.
meanings.sent2: I bought a new pair of shoes with caoutchoucs soles.
meanings.sent3: The clown's nose was so bouncy, it felt like it was made of caoutchoucs.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room like the bounce of caoutchoucs.
meanings.sent5: The caoutchoucs material was stretchy and durable, perfect for a variety of uses.

meanings.definition: Rubber products made from the latex of certain tropical trees.
meanings.sent1: The store imported colorful caoutchoucs from overseas.
meanings.sent2: The raincoat was made of high-quality caoutchoucs.
meanings.sent3: The kids had a fun time bouncing on the caoutchoucs balls in the playground.
meanings.sent4: Her words had a rubbery quality, bouncing off like caoutchoucs.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh caoutchoucs filled the air as the workers unpacked the shipment.
